name: Yao of the Coast
description:
I made a really short form experience game for MiniLD #73 about being on the beach, picking stuff up, and putting it down again.

I started playing around in Bosca Ceoil and having a great time of it, having had no music experience before. Made several tracks, but decided to make a tiny game around this one.

See if you can find the secret ending!

Arrows - Move

Space - Pickup/Put Down

G - Throw
